overview: Pearl Jam recorded an intimate 10-song set for VH1's Storytellers on May 31, 2006 at the New York's Avalon.  Filling in background and inspiration for songs old and new, Vedder riffed on the abusive relationship at the heart of "Better Man" and explained how the audience response to "Alive" forever changed the song's meaning for him.
title: Pearl Jam - VH1 Storytellers
